title: Dave Romano
text: David G. Romano (born June 1, 1940) is a <a href="Canadians">Canadian</a> former <a href="Curling">curler</a>. He played third on the 1972 Brier Champion team (skipped by <a href="Orest%20Meleschuk">Orest Meleschuk</a>), representing <a href="Manitoba">Manitoba</a>. They later went on to win the World Championships in <a href="Garmisch-Partenkirchen">Garmisch-Partenkirchen</a> of that year.
